title: Igor Stravinsky
summary: Igor Fyodorovich Stravinsky[lower-alpha 1] ComSE (17 June [O.S. 5 June] 1882 – 6 April 1971) was a Russian composer, pianist and conductor, later of French (from 1934) and American (from 1945) citizenship. He is widely considered one of the most important and influential composers of the 20th century.
